title: pudiya yOgam
sahitya:
pudiya yOgam payilvOm ulagil pUraNarAip-polivOm


anupallavi

  ati vishAlamAgi vAzhkkai amarat-tanmai sErap-


caraNam 1    anbil onrupaTTE aruL azhagai nALum pOTri
inbamAna poruLait-tUya idayam tannirk-kUDip-
    caraNam 2    purindiDum toNDugaLai avan pUjanaiyAkkiDuvOm 
terindiDum ulaginilE nara dEvarai AkkiDuvOm
